ProteinName	C-C chemokine receptor type 7 (C-C CKR-7) (CC-CKR-7) (CCR-7) (BLR2) (CDw197) (Epstein-Barr virus-induced G-protein coupled receptor 1) (EBI1) (EBV-induced G-protein coupled receptor 1) (MIP-3 beta receptor) (CD antigen CD197)

Length	378
Function	Receptor for the MIP-3-beta chemokine. Probable mediator of EBV effects on B-lymphocytes or of normal lymphocyte functions.
